The Concept

Our gorgeous planet is well worth exploring, but we only have one and need to take good care of it! The same goes for our body - it's an amazing machine, but it needs to be cared for. Both of these important thoughts are covered in our eco-friendly bicycle tours concept!


Biking is fun, and such a great way to get up close and personal with the city and your surroundings. Breathing the fresh air while you descover the wonders of Trondheim - without being held back by some glass, is really something worth trying.


We have a wide range of tours and guides, so we're sure to have something that fit's your needs and wishes. Have a look and come ride with us!

How it works

Have a look at our tours to find out which ones you'd like to participate in. Our tours vary in length and group-sizes. Some are early, others late - both to create the best atmosphere and fit your schedule.


Once you find the one you want, sign up through mail or phone. You'll get a reply with specific details for where and when to show up. We also do drop-ins if there's room, but it might be good to ask ahead to be sure you'll get a spot.


We have bikes for everyone, but you can choose to bring your own if you prefer. (Payment info here) Don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions!
